<style>
/* Page & Container */
body {
  font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;

}

.resume-container {
  max-width: 900px;
  margin: 40px auto;
  background-color: #001f3f; /* Navy Blue card */
  padding: 40px;
  border-radius: 15px;
  color: #ffffff;

}

/* Top line */
.top-line {

}

/* Section headings */
h2.section-title {
  font-size: 20px;
  font-weight: bold;
  border-bottom: 2px solid #ffffff;
  padding-bottom: 5px;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
  text-align: left;
  color: #ffffff;
}

/* Job titles, org, dates */
.job-title {
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 16px;
  color: #ffffff;
}

.job-org {
  font-style: italic;
  font-size: 15px;
  margin-bottom: 5px;
  color: #ffffff;
}

.job-date {
  font-size: 14px;
  margin-bottom: 5px;
  color: #ffffff; /* left aligned */
}

.achievement {
  margin: 5px 0 15px 0;
  color: #ffffff;
}

/* Core Competencies */
.core-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 20px;
  margin-top: 20px;
}

.core-box {
  background-color: #ffffff;
  color: #001f3f;
  border-radius: 10px;
  padding: 20px;
  flex: 1 1 40%;
  min-width: 200px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
}

.core-box h3 {
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: 12px;
  font-size: 18px;
  font-weight: bold;
  text-align: left;
  color: #001f3f;
}

.core-box ul {
  list-style-type: disc;
  padding-left: 20px;
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 15px;
  line-height: 1.6;
  color: #001f3f;
}

/* Navigation buttons */
.nav-buttons {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  margin-top: 30px;
}

.nav-buttons a {
  margin: 0 10px;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  background-color: #0077b6;
  color: #fff;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 5px;
  font-weight: bold;
}
</style>
